original_text: But they did not find Paul and Silas there. So they took hold of Jason and some other believers. They pulled them out of the house. They made them go and stand in front of the important officers of the city. They shouted, ‘These men have caused much trouble everywhere. Now they have come to our city.
korean_text: 발견하지 못하매 야손과 몇 형제들을 끌고 읍장들 앞에 가서 소리 질러 이르되 천하를 어지럽게 하던 이 사람들이 여기도 이르매

sentences.original_text: But they did not find Paul and Silas there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그곳에서 바울과 실라를 찾지 못했다.

sentences.original_text: So they took hold of Jason
They pulled them out of the house.
They made them go and stand
in front of the important officers of the city.
'These men have caused much trouble everywhere.
sentences.korean_translation: '이 사람들이 모든 곳에서 많은 문제를 일으켰다.'

sentences.original_text: Now they have come to our city.'
